text: The Edgewater Casino is a former (2005-2017) casino that was located at 760 Pacific Blvd South Vancouver, British Columbia. ==History== The Edgwater Casino opened in February 2005.World Casino Directory, September 12, 2017 - Edgewater Casino in downtown Vancouver to close this month - K. Morrison In 2006, the casino was acquired by Paragon Gaming who would manage it for more than ten years.Vancouver Is Awesome, February 4, 2019 - Vancouver News, Las Vegas’ Paragon Gaming sells stake in Parq Vancouver casino - By Glen Korstrom In September 2006, the company purchased the bankrupt casino for $43 million.Westender, October 19, 2006 (Via Newsbank.com) - Las Vegas firm hopes to revive ailing Edgewater Casino - Sean Condon The casino was closed on September 29, 2017. This was the same day that across the street, the Parq Vancouver opened its doors.Vancouver Courier, October 3, 2018 - Vancouver collects $45 million in casino revenue - Mike HowellDaily Hive , Nov 01, 2017 - News, Edgewater Casino is auctioning off its old equipment (PHOTOS) ==Statistics== In 2013, it generated $6.6 million for the city. In 2014 it was $7.2 million. In 2015, it was $8.3 million and 2016 it was $8.6 million.Vancouver Courier, October 3, 2018 - Vancouver collects $45 million in casino revenue - Mike Howell At one stage, the casino was the only licensed venue of its type in the city. ==Events== The Casino was well known for its hosting of live events.The Vancouver Sun, March 28, 2016 - Vancouver to host karaoke world championships - Scott Brown The 2016 Karaoke World Championships were held at the casino.KWC, Karaoke World Championships - Past Competitions, 2016 The competition ran from the 1st of November to the 6th.The Vancouver Sun, March 28, 2016 - Vancouver to host karaoke world championships - Scott Brown The Canada International Film Festival is an annual event that had been hosted by the casino since 2009.The Philippine Star, January 3, 2016 - 2015: Bounty harvest in international indie filmfests FUNFARE - Ricky LoThe University of British Columbia - Sharon Lin Takes Home Rising Star Award at the Canada International Film Festival In 2014, it was held from March 28-29.Vancouver Courier, March 13, 2014 - Entertainment, Reel People: Shorts - Sabrina Furminger / WestenderNorthwest Travel Magazine, 01/01/2014 - Top Northwest Film Festivals, Canadian International Film Festival: Vancouver, British Columbia; March 20-21 ==References== Category:Casinos in British Columbia Category:2005 establishments in British Columbia Category:2017 disestablishments in British Columbia Category:Casinos completed in 2005 Category:Buildings and structures in Vancouver Category:Defunct casinos in Canada
